body.name: Mini Washing Machine Portable Washer Machine and Dryer Foldable 9L, Portable Small Washer Machine, Bucket Smart Laundry Machine with 3 Cleaning Modes for Baby Clothes, Underwear, Camping, RV, Travel
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 8 hrs 17 mins
features: Portable Washing Machine 9L: tips for daily life: Washing clothes separately can avoid cross infection. This small washing machine is designed specifically for small clothes. It is used to wash clothes that require separate cleaning, such as underwear, socks, baby clothes, diapers, towels, vests, toys. The portable washer machine and dryer can makes your clothes cleaner and hygienic. You can say goodbye to hand washing, exquisitely care for your little laziness.

Portable Washing Machine and Dryer: This is a semi-automatic smart washing machine that integrates washer and spin dryer. The bucket foldable washing machine has 3 deep cleaning modes: 10min Standard washing, 5min Soft washing, and 3min Semi Dehydration. It is easy to use, touch the electronic panel, washing with one click. The 360 ° deep washing of positive and negative wave wheels can effectively remove various stains. Protect your and your family's health, say goodbye to stubborn stains~

Bucket Portable Washing Machine Foldable 9L: The personal hygiene washing machine has a family gold capacity of 9L, and can wash all underwear at once. It can hold up to 13 lb water + 8 Pcs underwear /12 Pcs socks /5 Pcs baby clothes /6 Pcs of pet clothes. Mini portable washing machine foldable uses high frequency vibration, positive and negative wave wheel to imitate hand washing clothes, strong deep cleaning, effective removal of dirt. Free your hands and save your precious time.

Energy-saving Portable Washing Machine: The portable washer adopts a low energy consumption and noise reduction motor, and the bottom motor compartment is improved to make the center of gravity sink, making the entire machine run more smoothly without shaking, with less noise, and not afraid of disturbing you, your family, and neighbors for rest. The small load and low power consumption of a small washing machine can save energy, protect the environment, and save water and electricity.

Bucket Foldable Washing Machine: The mini washing machine is made of upgraded environmentally friendly materials, which are more resistant to aging. The portable washing machine and dryer adopts a foldable portable bucket design, with a unfolded volume of 11.6 * 11.6 * 11.4 inches. Its folded volume is only 11.6 * 11.6 * 5.5 inches, making it easy to store when not in use and not occupying too much space. It is easy to carry and is very suitable for families, camping, travel, and RVs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ABXKZ Portable Washing Machine tips for daily life Washing clothes separately can avoid cross infection. This mini washing machine is designed specifically for small clothes. It is used to wash clothes that require separate cleaning, such as underwear, socks, baby clothes, diapers, towels, vests, toys. The portable washer can makes your clothes cleaner and hygienic. You can say goodbye to hand washing, exquisitely care for your little laziness.

The capacity of this bucket washing machine is 9L, which can hold up to 13 lb water + 8 Pcs underwear /12 Pcs socks /5 Pcs baby clothes /6 Pcs clothes /5 Pcs baby clothes. Small load washing machine can save water and electricity, protect the environment.

Touch Electronic Panel This is a foldable small bucket washer and spin dryer with touch electronic panel, washing with one click. There are three cleaning modes for small washing machine: 10min Standard Washing, 5min Soft Washing, and 3min Semi Dehydration Press and hold the "Switch" button for 2 seconds to turn the washing machine on or off. Toggle the cleaning mode with a single touch of the "Switch" button.
Hidden Handle 3.5lb lightweight Easy lift with one hand Washer & Spin Dryer in 1 separate drain basket No manual wringing Flexible Drainage Easy to release water, flexible drainage

Foldable Portable Washer Machine The drainage pipe is stored at the bottom of the machine bodyExtract the drainage pipe at the bottom and hang it at the topClip the drainage basket onto the washing machine turbineAssembling the drainage basketNote: The spin drying function of portable small washing machines cannot be compared to large washing machines, it's only half the effect of spin drying.Not recommended: bulky clothes, for example jeans, bathrobes, sweaterPS: Adding 2/3 of water to the washing machine results in the better washing effect

Portable Foldable Mini Portable Washer Our portable washer is compact and lightweight, making it the perfect accessory for small apartments, dormitories, RVs, camping trips. The small washing machine is also foldable, making it easy to store and carry around wherever you go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars SHould not market it as part dryer
reviews.reviewText: Cant even dry one small towel, which i hand wash and wring as much water as i can off of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Washes pretty good!
reviews.reviewText: I received the mini washer today. Could hardly wait to use it. I put 4 pairs of undies in. They came out clean & smelling good. The noise wasn't too loud. CONS; took forever to put basket together. Put small basket thru larger one, then it clicks into place. Directions very vague. Had to cut a paper plate to size for top of basket. Otherwise, the clothes spin right out of basket and shakes real bad. No lid came to insert in top of basket. Spin worked pretty good, just came out a little damp. Just had to squeeze a tiny bit of water out by hand of clothes. Doesn't hold much, but for socks & undies, does the trick. Had to watch a vedio to see how to get basket out, after struggling to remove it. Didn't receive the free little mesh bag, others comment about. All in all its a pretty nifty little washer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Washer Bag Works Great For Bras That Say Hand Wash Only
reviews.reviewText: The washer brag works great. I like the washer bag because I can wash items that say no machine wash inside of it. I have some bras made of stocking hose material that say handwash only because the pads and other pieces could be torn off, I know because I did wash in the machine and that happened to mine. So I ordered this bag and I washed one of them in it as a trial and it come out nice and clean and the pads were still intact and all the clasp were all in order. It is a good value and saves you time from handwashing everything and I recommend highly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Wash Bag
reviews.reviewText: I've always used washer bags for lingerie, but I especially like this one, so ordered it to try. I'm very pleased with it and have used it numbers of times already. It's perfect for my underwear, the smaller openings are perfect and on top of that, I really like the bright pink zipper!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks nice and does its job
reviews.reviewText: Not a lot can be said about the bag. It is attractive. It is made of thin material, and only fits two undergarments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Work so so
reviews.reviewText: The electric output not good, sometime work and other time not
